<div style = "background-color: #FEFEFE; padding-top: 35px; padding-left: 60px; padding-right: 60px; font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.6; margin: 0 auto; max-width: 900px;">

<img style='padding-right:20px; padding-bottom:12px;' align="left" width="70" src="https://github.com/pablobernabeu/VTT-Transcription-App/blob/main/Royalty-free%20from%20needpix.com.png?raw=true">

This open-source, R-based web application allows the conversion of video captions (subtitles) from the [Web Video Text Tracks (WebVTT) Format](https://www.w3.org/TR/webvtt1/) into plain texts. For this purpose, users upload a WebVTT file with the extension `.vtt` or `.txt` (examples available [here](https://github.com/pablobernabeu/VTT-Transcription-App/blob/main/Example_subtitles_1.vtt) and [here](https://github.com/pablobernabeu/VTT-Transcription-App/blob/main/Example_subtitles_2.txt)). Automatically, metadata such as timestamps are removed, and the text is formatted into a paragraph. The result is displayed below, and can be downloaded as `.docx` and `.txt` documents. Overall, this application serves to improve the accessibility of video captions.

The data is only available to the user, and is deleted when the website is closed.


<h3>Upload WebVTT file with `.vtt` or `.txt` extension</h3>

```{r}

fileInput("upload", NULL, buttonLabel = "Upload", multiple = FALSE, accept = c(".vtt", ".txt"), width = '500px')

# Process text
transcript = reactive({
  
  df = read.delim(input$upload$datapath)
  
  # Select the first and only column
  df = df[,1]
  
  # Remove upper information
  df = str_replace_all(df, '^WEBVTT$', '')
  df = str_replace_all(df, '^Kind: captions$', '')
  df = str_replace_all(df, '^Language: [[:alpha:]]*-[[:alpha:]]*$', '')
  
  # Remove long serial codes
  df = str_replace_all(df, '^[[:alnum:]]*-[[:alnum:]]*-[[:alnum:]]*-[[:alnum:]]*-[[:alnum:]]*$', '')
  
  # Remove ordinal numbering of utterances (single numbers in lines)
  df = str_replace_all(df, '^\\d*$', '')
  
  # Remove timestamps in both formats (dot or comma at the end)
  df = str_replace_all(df, '^\\d\\d:\\d\\d:\\d\\d\\.\\d\\d\\d --> \\d\\d:\\d\\d:\\d\\d\\.\\d\\d\\d$', '')
  df = str_replace_all(df, '^\\d\\d:\\d\\d:\\d\\d,\\d\\d\\d --> \\d\\d:\\d\\d:\\d\\d,\\d\\d\\d$', '')
  
  # Remove empty strings
  df = stri_remove_empty(df)
  
  # Concatenate lines
  df = str_c(df, collapse = ' ')
  
  # Return object
  df
  
})

```

# Enter preferred name

renderUI({
  if(isTruthy(input$upload)) {
    textInput('downloaded_file_name', 'Editable download name (extension omitted)',
              # Edit file name to remove extension
              value = str_replace(input$upload$name, '\\.vtt$|\\.txt$', ''),
              width = '500px'
    )
  } else print('Upon the upload, the transcription and the download options will be displayed here.')
})

<div style='padding-bottom:1px;'></div>

```{r}

renderUI({
  if(isTruthy(input$upload)) {
    
    # Create the actual downloadLink
    output$transcript_download_docx_link = renderUI({
      downloadLink('transcript_download_docx', HTML('<i class="fas fa-file-word fa-lg" aria-hidden="true"></i>&nbsp; Download .docx'),
                   style = 'border-bottom:none !important; text-decoration: none !important; font-weight: normal !important;', 
                   class = 'transcript-download')
    })
    
    # Add download handling
    output$transcript_download_docx = downloadHandler(
      
      filename = reactive({
        paste0(input$downloaded_file_name, '.docx') %>%
          # Edit file name to remove repeated extension
          str_replace('\\.docx.docx$', '.docx')
      }),
      
      # Based on: https://shiny.rstudio.com/articles/generating-reports.html
      content = function(file) {
        # Copy the report file and the template to a temporary directory before processing it, 
        # in case there aren't write permissions to the current working dir (which can happen 
        # when deployed).
        tempReport <- file.path(tempdir(), c('VTT-Transcription-App_doc_renderer.Rmd', 'VTT-Transcription-App-format-template.docx'))
        file.copy(c('VTT-Transcription-App_doc_renderer.Rmd', 'VTT-Transcription-App-format-template.docx'), tempReport, overwrite = TRUE)
        rmarkdown::render('VTT-Transcription-App_doc_renderer.Rmd', output_file = file)
      }
    )
    
    # Show link
    uiOutput('transcript_download_docx_link')
    
  }
})

```

<div style='padding-bottom:1px;'></div>

```{r}

renderUI({
  if(isTruthy(input$upload)) {
    
    # Create the actual downloadLink
    output$transcript_download_txt_link = renderUI({
      downloadLink('transcript_download_txt', HTML('<i class="fas fa-file-alt fa-lg" aria-hidden="true"></i>&nbsp; Download .txt'),
                   style = 'border-bottom:none !important; text-decoration: none !important; font-weight: normal !important;', 
                   class = 'transcript-download')
    })
    
    # Add download handling
    output$transcript_download_txt = downloadHandler(
      filename = reactive({
        paste0(input$downloaded_file_name, '.txt') %>%
          # Edit file name to remove repeated extension
          str_replace('\\.txt.txt$', '.txt')
      }),
      content = function(file) { cat(transcript(), file = file) }
    )
    
    # Show link
    uiOutput('transcript_download_txt_link')
    
  }
})

```
